txt.en: Thalfar would like to restore the gears of Menem-berej, a platform in the Silvertine Lodes that has been ransacked by the goblins.

'Our best hope of finding mithril in the Silvertine Lodes is to reclaim and repair the platform of Menem-berej, if you ask me.\n\n'If you could begin by restoring the wheels on the platform, that would be most helpful, [placeholder]!'
The gear-wheels are on the platform of Menem-berej in the centre of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nThalfar asked you to repair the gears on the platform of Menem-berej.
'Ah, well done, my friend! We will have Menem-berej back in working order in no time.'
Thalfar is at the camp at the centre of the Silvertine Lodes, overlooking Menem-berej.\n\nYou should return to Thalfar.
Thalfar is in the Deep Descent within the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should return to Thalfar and show him the Mark of Mazog.
'The gears of old ought to be repaired before we can truly begin our mining expedition in this area.'
'I am not at all sure it is wise to remain here in the deeps. With the goblins a constant threat and no sign of Mithril, it hardly seems worth the risk...'
